issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Appcelerator not invoke Xcode for publish iOS APP, i've Appcelerator 4.1 and Xcode 6.4.

Erro Log is:
!ENTRY com.appcelerator.titanium.360.ui 4 0 2015-08-27 17:17:08.694
!MESSAGE (Build 4.1.1.201507141126) [ERROR]  null
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.aptana.browser.support.WorkbenchBrowserSupport.createBrowser(WorkbenchBrowserSupport.java:98)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium360.internal.ui.launch.OnDemandPlansLaunchValidator.redirectToPlansPage(OnDemandPlansLaunchValidator.java:93)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium360.internal.ui.launch.OnDemandPlansLaunchValidator.preLaunchCheck(OnDemandPlansLaunchValidator.java:74)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.core.launching.TitaniumSingleProjectLaunchConfigurationDelegate.preLaunchCheck(TitaniumSingleProjectLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:53)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:840)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:739)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:1039)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$8.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:1256)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:54)

Thank's a lot

comments.body:
Hi,

We could not reproduce the error. Have you had a chance to try our the latest version of the Studio & SDK and try to publish again? Please let us know if you continue to get this error.
